text: Charlene Tilton (b. December 1, 1958 in San Diego) is an American actress. She acts mostly on television. She has also acted in a few movies. She is best known for playing Lucy Ewing on the CBS television series Dallas. ==References== Category:Actors from San Diego Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:1958 births Category:Living people
title: Charlene Tilton
